message: Let's be fair, Bob. A 55/45 split seems reasonable for us to start.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the value of money doesn't decrease for me.
Bob, my offer is decreasing, but yours isn't getting any better for me. This is my final offer above a 50/50 split. Take it or leave it.
I'm not budging. The inflation is on your side, not mine. You should be more willing to compromise.
Bob, it's clear you're playing hardball.  This is a significant compromise on my part to avoid further losses from inflation. Let's settle this now.
I see no reason to compromise when time is on my side. You're losing value with each round.
